dialogueTree.title: Encyclopedia: "This is the flag of Revachol the Su..."
dialogueTree.text: This is the flag of Revachol the Suzerainty.

links.title: Encyclopedia: "This isn't just one sun, but there..."
links.text: This isn't just one sun, but there are little suns dancing around the big sun. This is the Sevenfold Sun Miracle.

links.title: Encyclopedia: "It's an optical atmospheric anomaly..."
links.text: It's an optical atmospheric anomaly the first settlers saw. Happens in cold weather: six small suns around the big one. This complex halo-phenomena is how old Revachol got its flag.

links.title: Inland Empire: "It is but one of the many strange *..."
links.text: It is but one of the many strange *optic-atmospheric* phenomenon on this wondrous archipelago. You're sure you once saw sundogs -- in your youth. And blue flares....

links.title: You: ""Lieutenant -- the old flag of the..."
links.text: "Lieutenant -- the old flag of the Suzerain." (Point)

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Mhm." He looks around the apartmen..."
links.text: "Mhm." He looks around the apartment. "The tenant is an *old fashioned* guy."

links.title: Rhetoric: "By 'old fashioned' he means 'very r..."
links.text: By 'old fashioned' he means 'very right wing'.

links.title: You: "Bow down before the flag. [Finish t..."
links.text: Bow down before the flag. [Finish thought.]

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant does not bow to the..."
links.text: The lieutenant does not bow to the flag -- it accepts your salute with quiet dignity.

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "It is not my flag, he thinks -- my..."
links.text: It is not my flag, he thinks -- my flag is the signal blue of the Zone of Control.

links.title: Encyclopedia: "The flag accepts your honourable sa..."
links.text: The flag accepts your honourable salute with quiet dignity.

links.title: You: "Don't bow to the flag. [Finish thou..."
links.text: Don't bow to the flag. [Finish thought.]

links.title: Encyclopedia: "The flag doesn't seem to mind, it's..."
links.text: The flag doesn't seem to mind, it's just a colourful fabric with a sun sewn onto it. Like all feudal flags, it looks like a children's drawing.
